mapper.sql: id, name, code, description, icon_uri, order
mapper.insert:
insert into subject_category
id,
name,
code,
description,
icon_uri,
order,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{iconUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update subject_category
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon_uri = #{iconUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update subject_category set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_uri = #{iconUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from subject_category t order by t.order;
